name: Do androids dream of electric sheep ?
name_original: Do androids dream of electric sheep ?
description:
This Game has been created  for purpose of a 2 weeks game jam, on a set theme which was Blade Runner by Philip K Dick. 

What's the difference between an android and a human being ? When androids falls asleep how far their dreams are differents from ours ? Do they actually dream of sheep ? 

Our game takes place in an android dream, where they actually dream of electric sheep ! They have to collect them to recharge their battery before the morning. on the roofs of Los Angeles in 2049 in a pixel art style.

Enjoy !

Our team was composed by 4 members :





 Graphists : Eric POUGET (Saphyr), Timothée  KAMM, Nolwenn ARMAND Programmer : Lucas Lubiénicki
